attributes.action: Protect the jobs and salaries of British workers which are currently being eroded by the Governments policy of  actively flooding the jobs market with cheap foreign workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: However maybe we should encourage people from overseas to run for jobs as MPs and cut the wage bill in half overnight!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
